verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya gauracandra
jaya jaya paramānanda jaya nityānanda

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gaura-candra—whose name is Lord Gaurāṅga; jaya jaya—all glories; paramānanda—most joyful; jaya—all glories; nityānanda—unto Nityānanda Prabhu.
translation: Let me offer my respectful obeisances unto Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu, who is known as Gaurasundara. I also offer my respectful obeisances unto Nityānanda Prabhu, who is always very joyful.
